verses.verse: O <S%G5599><s%> <S%G453>foolish<s%> <S%G1052>Galatians,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> hath <S%G940>bewitched<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> that ye should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G2596>before<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> hath been evidently set <S%G4270>forth,<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you?<s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> I <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2983>Received<s%> ye <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G189>hearing<s%> of <S%G4102>faith?<s%>
Are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G453>foolish?<s%> having <S%G1728>begun<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> are ye <S%G3568>now<s%> made <S%G2005>perfect<s%> by the <S%G4561>flesh?<s%>
Have ye <S%G3958>suffered<s%> so many <S%G5118>things<s%> in <S%G1500>vain?<s%> <S%G1489>if<s%> it be <S%G2532>yet<s%> in <S%G1500>vain.<s%>

He therefore that <S%G2023>ministereth<s%> <S%G3767><s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> doeth he it <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G189>hearing<s%> of <S%G4102>faith?<s%>
Even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G3049>accounted<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

Know <S%G1097><s%> ye <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> which are <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture,<s%> <S%G4275>foreseeing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G1344>justify<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>heathen<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> preached before the <S%G4283>gospel<s%> unto <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> saying, <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> shall <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> be <S%G1757>blessed.<s%>
So <S%G5620>then<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> which be <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> are <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2671>curse:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1944>Cursed<s%> is every <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1696>continueth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> which are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> in the <S%G3844>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> it is <S%G1212>evident:<s%> <S%G3754>for,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G235>but,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Christ <S%G5547><s%> hath <S%G1805>redeemed<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2671>curse<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> being <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G2671>curse<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1944>Cursed<s%> is every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G2910>hangeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a tree: <S%G3586><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%> might <S%G1096>come<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we might <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> after the <S%G2596>manner<s%> of <S%G444>men;<s%> <S%G3676>Though<s%> it be but a <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> yet if it be <S%G2964>confirmed,<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G114>disannulleth,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> addeth <S%G1928>thereto.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> were <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promises<s%> <S%G4483>made.<s%> He <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G4690>seeds,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G4183>many;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> that the <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> that was confirmed <S%G4300>before<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> which <S%G1096>was<s%> four <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G3326>after,<s%> cannot <S%G208>disannul,<s%> <S%G3756><s%> that it should make the promise of none <S%G2673>effect.<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1860><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> be <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> it is no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1860>promise:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5483>gave<s%> it to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> serveth <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law?<s%> It was <S%G4369>added<s%> <S%G5484>because<s%> of <S%G3847>transgressions,<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> <S%G3757><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> should <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the promise was <S%G1861>made;<s%> and it was <S%G1299>ordained<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of a <S%G3316>mediator.<s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> a <S%G3316>mediator<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a mediator of <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1520>one.<s%>

Is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promises<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> God <S%G1096>forbid:<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there had been a <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> which <S%G1410>could<s%> have given <S%G2227>life,<s%> <S%G3689>verily<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> should have <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> hath <S%G4788>concluded<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> might be <S%G1325>given<s%> to them that <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> before <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> we were <S%G5432>kept<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> shut <S%G4788>up<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> which should <S%G3195>afterwards<s%> be <S%G601>revealed.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3807>schoolmaster<s%> to bring us <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> after that <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> no <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G3807>schoolmaster.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> of you as have been <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> have put <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

There <S%G1762>is<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1672>Greek,<s%> there <S%G1762>is<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G1401>bond<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1658>free,<s%> there <S%G1762>is<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G730>male<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G2338>female:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> be <S%G5547>Christ's,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> ye <S%G11>Abraham's<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>
